Params: {2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hm...? Why isn't Amy talking to Nanami?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hm... but you can't install a beta lamp this way, let Nanami help you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Alright! Anything else you need help with? Nanami will help you solve it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "Wait, I can't throw you all my... Why are you helping me?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "Get over yourself, I'm not your friend!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Umm... But that ol' pops said Nanami's everyone's new friend! I thought you all agreed so you stayed silent.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And, Commandant said that friends should help each other out!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "I don't need friends, let alone a Construct friend.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "...I don't want to force myself to forget someone again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wow! Amy, you can clear your memory data without doing a system reset?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: "I don't mean it like that, it's...!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "If you can't reset it, then you can't forget it, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amy', 3: 'Shove off, I have to handle the equipment for tomorrow.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami's scanning system activates automatically. The music box was broken long before Nanami touched it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The comb in the music box is stuck, that's why it's not making any sound.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Haha! You asked the right person! It's Nanami's time to shine!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Um... If you read the comb teeth from their directional order in machine language...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'It says "Amy and Robert are friends forever."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'So, this music box has been singing "Amy and Robert are friends forever..."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'To make a music box comb with such precision, hmmm... Is Robert also a Construct?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And... a little bit of this... and... done!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Well... since I don't know what Robert looks like, Nanami will just have to stand in for a while! Be friends forever with Robert!"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And Nanami too! Nanami will be friends forever with Amy!'}
